summary: Frontend UI and theming were added (header/hero/banner, uploader, gallery grid/cards) plus custom-domain runtime config and a written CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md guide. However, the backend image APIs and frontend data hooks appear to be placeholders/non-functional based on the diff, and the required generated static image files themselves are not shown as added. Internet Identity/auth scaffolding was added even though the app is specified to work without authentication.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend image storage APIs (upload/list/fetch/delete) that work without authentication and return required metadata.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo only includes an imported mixin with no visible upload/list/fetch/delete methods or return shapes; frontend hooks explicitly warn that backend methods are 'not yet available' and return empty/mock data, indicating the API contract is not implemented/exposed end-to-end.

missing_requirements.requirement: Frontend must actually upload, list, display, and delete images via backend APIs with loading/error states.
missing_requirements.reason: While UI components exist, the data layer is stubbed: list returns [] with a warning, upload simulates progress and returns a mock success, and delete logs a warning without calling a backend method. This prevents gallery population and real delete/upload behavior.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: UI references the logo and hero banner paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication scaffolding (provider, hooks, identity-aware actor creation).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly requires that all image methods work without Internet Identity sign-in and does not request adding authentication now; diff adds II context/provider and uses identity in actor creation.

hallucinated_features.description: Download button/action for each gallery item.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for upload, gallery view, and delete; download functionality was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Polling/auto-refresh of gallery list every 10 seconds.
hallucinated_features.reason: Live updates were a non-goal (no real-time collaboration/live updates); while polling is not WebSockets, periodic refetch was not requested.
